name: Rallying Cry
simple_desc: Defensive Skill: Bellow a rallying cry. All allies move faster and regain resources faster.
Mod5_Description: {c_important}Rallying Cry{/c} generates {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} Fury and grants you an additional {c_number}[{SF_8} * 100|%x|]{/c} Resource Generation.
Mod6_Description: {c_important}Rallying Cry{/c} grants you {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MOD_FORTIFY_BASE})|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.Â While Rallying Cry is active, you gain an additional {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MOD_FORTIFY_PERHIT})|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} each time you take or deal direct damage.
